Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: RESULTS : Trazodone at 2 . 5 - 20 mg / kg i . p . did not induce catalepsy , and did not antagonize apomorphine ( 1 . 5 and 3 mg / kg ) stereotypy and apomorphine ( 0 . 05 mg / kg ) - induced catalepsy .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Catalepsy |
| Stereotypy |

In the given paragraph, the diseases mentioned are "catalepsy" and "stereotypy". The former is mentioned twice, once in relation to apomorphine-induced catalepsy and once as antagonized by Trazodone, while the latter is mentioned in relation to apomorphine-induced stereotypy.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Catalepsy |

In the given paragraph, only the term "catalepsy" clearly refers to a disease. The term "stereotypy" could be considered a symptom or behavior rather than a disease, but in this context, it is mentioned in relation to a disease state induced by apomorphine, so it is included as a disease entity.
